Hannah Oppenheimer

Product Designer, Ice Cream Maker

About Portfolio Blog

Hi,

I’m a product designer and developer based in Austin, Texas. I’m experienced working on small teams to build important tools, mostly in the healthcare technology space.

I do end-to-end design, which means I am comfortable and capable of leading or participating in all of the following:

  • design sprints
  • user tests
  • wireframes
  • mocks
  • clickable prototypes
  • HTML & CSS/Sass

I might be available for contract work. Please email me to set up a meeting to discuss your project.

Hannah

P.S. I make ice cream, too. Shop coming soon. In the meantime, enjoy these pictures of scoops I ate in Italy.
